Shayma Helali (Arabic), (a mụrụ na Mee 3, 1985) bụ onye na-agụ egwu na Tunisia.
A mụrụ Shayma Helali na mba Tunis n'ọnwa Mee 3, 1985
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ afọ atọ na academy nke egwu na Tunis ebe o nwetara usoro olu zuru oke
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na otu, ọ gafere usoro nhọpụta nke LBC Star Academy
Ọ na-ekere òkè na oge nke atọ nke mmemme ahụ n'afọ 2006.
Ọ gara na ọkara ikpeazụ mana njem ahụ kwụsịrị maka ya n'ọnụ ụzọ nke ikpeazụ
Otú ọ dị, akụkụ ya na-eme ka o kwenye
Site n'ịrụ ọrụ n'elu ikpo okwu jupụtara n'amara na olu ya miri emi na nke dị egwu nwere ihe dịka kpakpando nke Orient Oum Kalthoum
Ihe fọdụrụ ya bụ nri ehihie n'ọrụ ya
Chaima hụrụ n'afọ 2008 site na duo na-aga nke ọma na Assi El Hellani, ezigbo akụkọ ifo na onye agha nke Eastern Lebanon showbiz.
Ha abụọ na-ekpuchi Rja3ni Raja Aw3ni
N'afọ 2009, o mechara wepụta egwu otu onye mbụ ya bụ Meen Bya3sha2 Bid2i2a nke Salim Salama dere ma Fares Eskander dere
Ndị ọzọ dịka "Ana Nahwek" na "Fakra" sochiri egwu a.

N'afọ 2011, mgbe mgbanwe nke na-eme nri ehihie n'oge opupu ihe ubi ndị Arab nke Tunisia, onye bụbu onye na-achọ Star Academy mere na Lebanọn wepụtara ukwe mba ahụ "Ya Tunis El Khadra" nke a nabatara nke ọma, nke abụọ sochiri gbasara otu isiokwu ahụ "Law tinadini biladi"

Ikike nke Chayma bara uru karịa, dịka ọ gosipụtara n'afọ 2009 na olu a cappella nke aha "El Ayam Daret" mana ọhịa nke ahịa egwu na igosi echiche azụmaahịa nwere echiche dị iche.
N'afọ 2014, Shayma nwetara ihe nrite nke egwu kachasị mma maka egwu ya " Emta nsitek" site na General Union for the Arab Producers na ihe nrite maka onye na-agụ egwu kachasị mma na Middle East Music Awards (MIMA awards).
N'afọ 2016, Shyama Helali sonyeere Rotana wee wepụta abọm mbụ ya na ha "Shayma Helali 2016".
Alụmdi na nwunye Shayma Helali mere n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2018
Ọ mara ọkwa alụmdi na nwunye ya na Instagram.
